title: WTT: lot of low condition T206 HOF's and SL's

posts.post_title: WTT: lot of low condition T206 HOF's and SL's
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Marc Del Percio
I have the following T206 HOF and SL cards available:

CHANCE (yellow portrait) Tolstoi - SGC Auth.
BASTIAN - p
DUFFY - p
LENTZ - p/f
MARQUARD (portrait) - SGC 10
MARQUARD (hands at thighs) - p
McGINNITY - p/f
McGRAW (finger in air) - p/f
MILLER (Dallas) - p
MOLESWORTH - p
PERSONS - p

All cards are in poor to fair condition.  Scans available upon request.  I'm looking for the following T206's in similar condition to complete my set.  Also willing to trade for T207's.

Keeler (with bat)
Tinker (portrait
Bay
Foster
Helm
Jordan (Atlanta)
Kiernan
Manion
Otey
Paige
Revelle
Seitz
Shaughnessy
C. Smith
Violat

Thanks for looking and please e-mail with any offers.
